name: Dynamic
description: A module which accepts JavaScript math expressions to produce each color channel based on the original image's color. See Infragrammar.

red.desc: Expression to return for red channel with R, G, B, and A inputs

green.desc: Expression to return for green channel with R, G, B, and A inputs

blue.desc: Expression to return for blue channel with R, G, B, and A inputs

monochrome (fallback).desc: Expression to return with R, G, B, and A inputs; fallback for other channels if none provided
